---
title: "Adding rows and columns"
format: html
---

Data can be added to a __tibble__ with the intuitively named functions:

- `tibble::add_row()`: Add one or more rows to a __tibble__
- `tibble::add_column()`: Add one or more columns to a __tibble__

## Create example tibbles

Before demonstrating the two functions we will create a few __tibbles__.

```{r}
num_tbl <- tibble::tibble(x = 1:3, y = 4:6, z = 7:9)
```


## Adding one row or column

Display the __tibble__ `num_tbl`

```{r}
num_tbl
```

Add a column
```{r}
tibble::add_column(num_tbl, aa = 10:12)
```

Add a row

```{r}
tibble::add_row(num_tbl, x = 11, y = 12, z = 13)
```
